ItemWeapon.name: Zokol rifle
ItemWeapon.description: An automatic rifle famed for being simple and rugged. Can survive impact, dirt, mud, immersion and the digestive processes of larger and less discerning predators. No one said it was the most accurate or controllable weapon to fire though. Autofire does 4-30 damage
